Willy_Text: Hey there, I'm looking for a big wad o' bug guts. The juicier the better... at least that's what the crabs seem to like... 100 pieces should do the trick.
Willy_Objective_0_Text: Collect a bunch of bug meat
Willy_Objective_1_Text: Place the bug meat in the barrel next to Willy's house.
Pam_Text: Heard there's a spirit made out of potatoes that really packs a whallop, if you know what I mean. Mind dropping a few taters into a keg and bringing me a batch or two?
Pam_Objective_0_Text: Keg a few potatoes and collect 12 batches
Pam_Objective_1_Text: Place the product in Pam's kitchen.
Pierre_Text: Hello there. For an upcoming promotion, I'm thinking of offering some high-quality vegetables at a slight premium... Know where a thrifty shopkeep might find 25 gold-star vegetables?
Pierre_Objective_1_Text: Place the crops in the empty produce box in Pierre's shop.
Robin_Text: Hey! I have an idea for a new style of bed, but I'll need 80 hardwood to make it happen. Can anyone help?                     -Jinja
Robin_Objective_1_Text: Add the hardwood to the stockpile in Jinja's house.
Emily_Text: Hey! I'm going to invite some friends over to do a "rock rejuvenation" ceremony, but I'll need some crystals to channel the right energies. Do you think you could lend me a hand?
Demetrius_Text: For unknown reasons, the local population of {FishType:Text} has grown to an unsustainable level. I need a local angler to help reduce their numbers.
Demetrius2_Text: For unknown reasons, the local population of {FishType:Text} has grown to an unsustainable level. I need a local angler to help reduce their numbers.
Gus_Text: {Greeting}... but I'll need two dozen eggs. Any takers?                -Gus
Gus_Objective_1_Text: Put the eggs in Gus' fridge.
Gus_RE_Greeting_0: I've got the urge to make my famous giant omelet
Gus_RE_Greeting_1: I've got the urge to make another giant omelet
Lewis_Text: {Text} Anyone who ships 100 {Crop:TextPlural} by the end of the season will earn a substantial reward from the Pelican Town Agricultural Fund.
Lewis_RE_Text_0: {Crop:TextPluralCapitalized} are in high demand this year.
Lewis_RE_Text_1: Apparently, {Crop:TextPlural} are considered the latest 'superfood' in Zuzu City.
Lewis_RE_Text_2: There's a new beauty craze in Zuzu City... apparently, a lotion made from {Crop:Text} is said to remove wrinkles.
Lewis_RE_Text_3: The Queen of Sauce was recently spotted dining on fresh {Crop:Text}. Now everyone in the world wants one!
Lewis_RE_Text_4: The Governor is holding a banquet, and his Chefs are ordering huge numbers of {Crop:TextPlural}.
Wizard_Text: I seek an extremely rare and powerful goop, known as 'ectoplasm'. It can be found in the remains of slain ghosts.      -M. Rasmodius
Wizard_Objective_0_Message: Ah, It's brimming with the energy of forgotten souls... perfect.$h#$b#Now, begone! I shall require perfect silence to discern the true nature of this substance.
Clint_Text: The number of {Monster:LocalizedName} in the local caves have made mining dangerous... for other people, not me! There's good money for anyone willing to slay 50 of them.          -Clint
Linus_Text: I have an idea. There's a lot of trash in the water. Why don't we fish some out to make the valley more beautiful?                     -Linus
Linus_Objective_1_Text: Dump the trash in the recycling bin behind the train platform.
Evelyn_Text: George thinks no one in town cares about him. I'd like to prove him wrong! A dozen leeks should do the trick... they're his favorite.                      -Evelyn
Evelyn_Objective_1_Text: Place the leeks in Evelyn's kitchen.
Wizard2_Text: I require assistance in tracking down the rare and dangerous prismatic slime, within the local caves. Bring me a jar of its prismatic jelly and you will be duly rewarded.        -M. Rasmodius
Wizard2_Objective_1_Text: Deliver a prismatic jelly to Wizard
Wizard2_Objective_1_Message: Ah... you've returned from the hunt. I sense that you were successful!$h#$b#Now, hand over the jelly and begone! I have important work to do.
Robin2_Text: I'm putting on a little promotion, just for fun. If anyone can collect 1000 pieces of {Resource:Text} in a week, they'll earn a reward. And you can keep the {Resource:Text}!             -Jinja
Gunther_Text: Calling all amateur paleontologists! I need 100 pieces of bone for my studies. Please drop them off at the museum counter!          -Gunther
Gunther_Objective_0_Text: Place the bones in the drop box at the museum counter.
Caroline_Text: I want to experiment with tropical cooking, but it's hard to find any ingredients. If someone could ship 100 {Crop:TextPlural}, it might help!
Willy2_Text: There's nothin' like tropical fishing... To keep the art alive, I'm offering a reward for whoever can bring in a good island haul.
QiChallenge_Text: I will provide you with 600 Qi Beans. Plant these, grow them, and ship at least 500 of them in a week or less. But beware, Five plagues will descend upon you, threatening your crop...
QiChallenge2_Text: I've hidden Qi Beans throughout the world. Find them, grow them, propagate them, and ship 500 Qi Fruit within the time limit.
QiChallenge3_Text: Think you can score 50,000 points in Junimo Kart endless mode? Prove it.
QiChallenge3_Objective_0_Text: Score 50,000 points in Junimo Kart endless mode.
QiChallenge4_Text: Find 4 prismatic shards. Place them in my collection box.
QiChallenge4_Objective_0_Text: Place 4 Prismatic Shards into Qi's collection box.
QiChallenge5_Text: Your task is to make it to level 100 in the Skull Cavern. However, you can't eat or drink anything while there.
QiChallenge5_Objective_0_Text: Make it to level 100 in the Skull Cavern.
QiChallenge6_Text: Ship 100,000g worth of freshly cooked items.
QiChallenge6_Objective_0_Text: Ship 100,000g worth of freshly cooked items.
QiChallenge7_Text: Give 50 loved gifts in one week.
QiChallenge7_Objective_0_Text: Give 50 loved gifts in one week.
QiChallenge8_Text: Family members of the legendary fish have returned to the valley. You have three days to catch Ms. Angler, Glacierfish Jr., Son of Crimsonfish, Radioactive Carp, and The Legend II.
QiChallenge9_Text: The mine elevator system has been reset, and new dangers have emerged from deep underground. Make it to the bottom of the mines in one week.
QiChallenge9_Objective_0_Text: Reach the bottom of the mines, again.
QiChallenge10_Text: The Skull Cavern has been invaded by powerful monsters. Make it to level 100 in one piece.
QiChallenge10_Objective_0_Text: Make it to level 100 of the Skull Cavern.
QiChallenge11_Text: There's a second version of me, hiding somewhere in town. Can you catch him?
QiChallenge12_Text: Find 100 each of red, orange, yellow, green, blue, and purple items. Place them in my collection box.
QiChallenge12_Objective_0_Text: Place 100 red items into Qi's collection box.
QiChallenge12_Objective_1_Text: Place 100 orange items into Qi's collection box.
QiChallenge12_Objective_2_Text: Place 100 yellow items into Qi's collection box.
QiChallenge12_Objective_3_Text: Place 100 green items into Qi's collection box.
QiChallenge12_Objective_4_Text: Place 100 blue items into Qi's collection box.
QiChallenge12_Objective_5_Text: Place 100 purple items into Qi's collection box.
